Articles.Content:
The Exxsandere (Eck-SAN-deir) program is a century-long initiative to colonize the entire kerbolar system. Moho, eve, mun/minmus, duna, dres, jool sarnus urlum neidon and plock (Sarnus urlum and neidon are from OPM) and everythuing in between! From zero to hero genesis kerman, owner of Soup Aerospace Industries have made ground-breaking progress on the space program, nearly making it to orbit within months of his first government check (Sreenshots and crafts coming soon) 

KerbalX craft hangar: https://kerbalx.com/hangars/121122
